hopobject.name: VCWC
hopobject.body: It is proposed to implement a speaker dependent / independent system for voice command recognition. The system will implement a denoising method for noise removal from the voice command. It is proposed to implement denoising and voice recognition using DSP. The recognized commands will then activate a controller which is PIC/Arduino based controller. It is proposed to implement a system using ultrasonic transducer and a motorized control for wheelchair.
hopobject.shortdesc: It is proposed to implement a multiprocessor based wheelchair controller system using a DSP processor.
